definitions.title: vb.

be in dread, abs. De 28:66, Is 12:2, Is 33:14, Is 44:8, Is 44:11, Ps 78:53, Pr 3:24; ´[[לאׁ פ]] Je 36:24 sign of callousness; c. acc. cogn. [[פַּחַד]] De 28:67, Job 3:25 Ps 14:5 = Ps 53:6; c. [[מִן]] pers. Is 19:17, Job 23:15, Ps 27:1 (‖[[יׇרֵא]]), cf. Ps 119:161, and (c. [[מִפְּנֵי]]) Is 19:16; c. [[עַל]] rei Je 33:9 (+ [[רָֽגְזוּ]]); c. [[אֶל]], pregn., turn in dread to each other Je 36:16, submitting to ´[[י]] Ho 3:5, Mic 7:17 (‖[[יׇרֵא]]).
be in awe (at ´[[י]]'s favour), abs., Is 60:5.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: be in great dread, Impf. 2 ms. [[וַתְּפַחֵד]] Is 51:13, c. [[מִפְּנֵי]] rei; Pt. abs. [[מְפַחֵד]] Pr 28:14 deeply dreading (sc. sin).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הִפְחַיד]] Job 4:14 filled my bones with dread.
